description: Hide like notifications. Will not affect the notification count
Show a notice on the notification page for where the script settings can be found
extendedDescription: Options with the ðŸ›ˆ button has more information available if you click it

description: Show a spec to dismiss notifications when signed in
Media social tab average score, progress and notes
Media social tab feed filters
extendedDescription: 'Has replies' is the only filter that works if not signed in with the script. A 'Following' filter becomes available if you do.

description: Add a button to collapse comment threads in the forum
Add the tagged media to the forum preview on the home page
extendedDescription: The forum preview only shows one tag by default, so it's just going to say 'anime' or 'manga' without telling you which media it's about. This module adds a second tag, shortening the title somewhat if there's not enough space.

description: Make browse default to manga
Add a button to lists to create 3x3's from list entries. Click the button, and then select nine entries
Enable an API for other scripts to control automail [Don't enable this unless you know what you are doing]
Show the definitions of tags when adding new ones to an entry
Add MAL scores to media

Add MAL recs to media
Add basic data below the title on media pages
Add your score and progress to media pages
Add confidence scores to reviews
Add the total number of ratings to review ratings on the home page
Link your activities in the social tab of media, and between individual activities
Add more sorting options to browse
Enumerate the multiple credits for staff in the submission form to help avoid duplicates
Show the score on the activity when people complete something
Show the score on the activity when people drop something
Show an index of custom tags on anime and manga lists
Follow count on social page
Add a notice on top of the other data on an anime page if a dub is available (works by checking for voice actors)
Make a guess for the number of chapters for releasing manga
Don't remove external links from media pages on mobile
Full lists for tags, staff and studios in stats
Include companies that aren't animation studios in the extended studio table
Don't include progress from rewatches/rereads in stats
Hide the custom tags tables by default
Add an entry in the custom tag tables with all media not on a custom list
Add an entry in the custom tag tables with all media
Add 'time to complete' info to the tag tables
Replace the native comparison feature
Give smiley ratings distinct colours
Hide the global feed
Add filter options to the feeds to hide posts with few comments or likes
Colour code the right border of activities by media status
Hide status posts containing this word:
Enable profile backgrounds
Add a colour picker in the footer for adjusting the site themes
Add progress bars to the list previews
Embed linked tweets
extendedDescription:
This works by runnig Twitter's official embedding script. But since loading external code is not allowed for Firefox addons, this setting will only work in userscript mode.
Be adviced that Twitter embedding displays NSFW content no differently than other content.

description: Make cards for links to age restricted content

Make the 'home' button scroll to the top on the home feed
Use 5-width favourite layout at all screen sizes
Make the browse section more compact
Enable custom profile CSS
Green titles for manga
Give a better space to the following list on the social tab [under development]
Limit the 'in progress' sections to 10 entries
Limit the 'in progress' sections to 8 entries
Always show the recommendation voting data
Add a 'my threads' link in the forum
Hide AWC threads from the forum preview on the home page. Number of AWC-free threads to display:
Load the expanded view of 'in progress' in the usual place instead of full width if left in that state [weird hack]
Add fallback text for missing images in the sidebar and favourite sections
Short romaji titles for everyday use. Life is too short for light novel titles
Remove clutter from profiles (milestones, history chart, genres)

View advanced scores
Double click activities to zoom
Support for right-to-left flow [under development]
Do not load images on the low bandwidth feed
Remove banner shadows

Use a dark menu dropdown in dark mode
Add more list import and list export options
Add + and - buttons to quickly change scores on your list
Allow drag-and-drop of text into navbar for search

$settings_partialLocalisationLanguage_description
extendedDescription:
Partial localisation. Does not translate the whole site.
For Japanese, you may also want to change your title language at https://anilist.co/settings/media

Want to contribute? See: https://github.com/hohMiyazawa/Automail/issues/69
